main event: A civilian woman reported seeing two objects moving slowly in the sky on August 7, 1952, in Dayton, Ohio.
interesting points: The objects were reported to have a weird glow similar to a light bulb behind a thin cloud., One witness described the objects as being about 15 times the size of a star., Another observation noted an object with red and blue lights hovering over the area., The sightings were reported around 10 PM, suggesting it was still dark outside., The reports included descriptions suggesting the objects resembled flying saucers but were not confirmed as such.
